A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Long time star wars fan here. If you'd like to watch a movie with an extremely boring plot\, continued attempts at pathetic humor\, and dialog that could be assembled by an elementary school child\, then this is the movie for you. Not only was the movie itself horrid\, what it did to the Star Wars saga was absolutely absurd. I have a hard time thinking that the director/writer\, Rian Johnson\, could have possibly been a star wars fan prior to creating this monstrosity. I am indeed what you can consider a Star Wars \"fanboy\" and the reasons this movie in particular upset me is NOT because of its differences. Neither \"Rogue One\" nor \"The Force Awakens\" received this type of overwhelming criticism from such a large group of long time fans so to people trying to defend this \"fanboy\" mentality of \"anti-change\,\" find a new excuse. Please help us JJ Abrams\, you're my only hope.
